Package org.smooks.support

Smooks Utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassUtil
    Utility methods to aid in class/resource loading.
    CollectionsUtil
    Collections Utilities.
    DollarBraceDecoder
    Decoder for Strings containing "${xxxxx}" type patterns.
    DomUtils
    W3C DOM utility methods.
    FileUtils
    File utilities.
    FreeMarkerTemplate
    FreeMarker template.
    FreeMarkerUtils
    FreeMarker utility class.
    MultiLineToStringBuilder
    Static utility class for generating JSON like multi line Strings from Maps, List, Arrays and the ExecutionContext.
    MVELTemplate
    MVEL template.
    SAXElementWriterUtil
    SAXElement XML writing/serialization utility class.
    SAXUtil
    SAX utility methods.
    SmooksUtil
    Smooks utilities.
    StreamUtils
    Stream Utilities.
    URIUtil
    URI utility methods.
    XmlUtil
    XMl utility methods.
